page.title: United to Cut U.S. Flights
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - UAL Corp.<A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=UALAQ.OB target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">UALAQ.OB</A>, the bankrupt parent of United Airlines, on Wednesday said it would reduce U.S. flights and increase capacity on more lucrative international routes, in keeping with its aggressive cost-cutting efforts.
